creator: agebosma@gmail.com
text:
It would be handy for the manual to include a reference of all supported elements and their attributes with a description and their possible values. So far I haven't been able to find one.
A complete list is easier to navigate through than having to go through each documentation section.

Possible attributes, nested elements and their default values and possible values depend on the task. So the intuitive place to look at is the task documentation.

Comparing the amount of work (introducing a new generation of that list from the current manual, patching the current manual by required 'copy-me-markers') with the expected benefit (personally I dont see any ;) make me think that we should drop this.
creator: jan@materne.de
